title: The New Texture Rebalances @ Ququroon
body:
Good job on the rebalancing! I just wanna pick out a few:

**GRAGAS** has a yellowish skin tone, I never understood why xD. He should be red/pinkish. 
Here's my little edit (right side, left is yours):

http://i62.tinypic.com/1zw1dz4.png
I tried to give him colors to match his new splash art. Pinkish skin tone, reddish nose, more visible white paintings(tattoos?) and a special touch on the barrel ^^.

Gragas new splash
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CFn2TTbX1ZM/VElkupapioI/AAAAAAAAbWQ/GWJmjMCSSEY/s1600/Gragas_Splash_0.jpg

**UDYR**. Somewhat like Gragas, I never understood why he has such a dark skin color. His new splash art is more realistic so I tried to do the same for his model (edit on the right, yours left):

http://i58.tinypic.com/xkvl76.png
A nordic skin tone with extra details on his arms (to match his splash :D) when he goes Phoenix. I also ripped his spiked shoulder shirt in pic 2.0.  ~You can click on the images for full size.

Udyr new splash
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EaQxe8J6ee0/VDdD1ro2nDI/AAAAAAAAaq8/xZnzL_ABtM8/s1600/Udyr_Splash_0.jpg
---

P.S **Urgent** TU needed for Morgana x_x 
Something like this!
http://i59.tinypic.com/21kjvwo.png

replies.body: SO MUCH AGREEMENt. MORG IS NOT A ZOMBIE.
Indeed! Poor Morgy

Uhh what? A pretty big amount of morgs character and audio feedback is very zombie-like.

Not to say that she is or acts undead, but she does act very depressed and lifeless.

None of that means she should appear green of all colors. Her classic is one of the most disappointing skins in the game. 
She's evil, not sickly.

Well shes not just evil really, she is scorned. So determined to make things right for her people. 
A part of her is good.

Kayle is the lifeless political zombie who abandoned her sister.

So I totally saw this earlier, but I've been a bit swamped today.

Anyhoo. I'll pass on the feedback for the skin tones on Udyr/Gragas. As for Morgana, that's obviously a much larger thing she needs. *I do want it pretty bad though. *

Thank you for the feedback and paintovers!

> So I totally saw this earlier, but I've been a bit swamped today.
> 
> Anyhoo. I'll pass on the feedback for the skin tones on Udyr/Gragas. As for Morgana, that's obviously a much larger thing she needs. *I do want it pretty bad though. *
> 
> Thank you for the feedback and paintovers!



Can you please also comment on the Hair colour of Sheriff Caitlyn??

right now on Live is Black, and you turned it blue on the update...
.. it was one of the 1st skins I got in the game (if not the 1st!) and I loved it because of the black hair.... with blue feels.. weird, and out of place, specially combined with the brown and black outfit.
So, fun story. The artist accidentally iterated on an older version that had the blue hair. This happens every now and then on this project. Expect brown hair in the next PBE push!
Which is today? maybe? :)

YES! I have Sheriff Caitlyn too and it was my first skin. I hated the new blue hair, it doesn't fit the skin at all, specially because is a very light blue, not darker like the other ones. I'm glad that was a mistake.
You're very welcome Ququ! Thanks for replying and letting us know. I'm sure you'd do a wonderful job with Morgana :)!

> So I totally saw this earlier, but I've been a bit swamped today.
> 
> Anyhoo. I'll pass on the feedback for the skin tones on Udyr/Gragas. As for Morgana, that's obviously a much larger thing she needs. *I do want it pretty bad though. *
> 
> Thank you for the feedback and paintovers!

Definitely consider it. The color adjustments in OP's post look significantly better. I have questioned some of the color choices, myself, and they look unnatural. Morg clearly needed it though I got used to Udyr and forgot about it but it definitely looks better with the edit. Gragas I never really considered, but it does look reasonably better then the odd yellow tint. Even without the splash arts as reasoning... why did Riot's art team add such strange color tints in the first place? I am curious as to the reasoning.

@Ququroon First i must say, your comment made my day! however, I'd also like to question her wings. You'd think with the extra power morg gained from dark magic, she'd keep her beautiful wings; it wouldn't destroy them and shred them up to lumpy chunks.

> **GRAGAS** has a yellowish skin tone, I never understood why xD. He should be red/pinkish. 

Alchohol consumption damages the liver, enough damage to the liver can cause jaundice, jaundice causes yellowing of the skin.

Udyr, meh.

Could't agree more on Morganna.

Ahh. Thanks for the informative post, learned something new! I'd still point at his new splash art though. Most of us like their in game models to resemble the splashes :P

Udyr's skin on his splash art and in game model are like Ying and Yang, that doesn't bug you :o?

I guess it would but I don't really play Udyr, and as principally a dominion player I hardly ever even see him.

However, had I to choose between the two, I would rather see the splash art darkened than the model lightened.  Udyr is a wildman, spends all his time in the sun and dirt, it makes sense to me that he would be darker skinned.
Racist much?

Figured someone would mention racism :'). I'm not. They're both clearly inspired by Germanic myths so the dark and yellow skin tone made no sense to me.
Also, their splash arts - which is the main reason I edited - support my view imo.
Great work, solid insights, but tinypic? Why does anyone use tinypic?
Thanks! What's wrong with tinypic xD? Suggest me something else? Imgur o.o?

> Thanks! What's wrong with tinypic xD? Suggest me something else? Imgur o.o?

Use Gyazo. You can get a link instantly to any picture / GIF.

http://gyazo.com/
Tinypic is a bloated website, is clunky to use, drips with ads, and doesn't look as nice as imgur. Definitely avoid tinypic.

In {{champion:77}}'s splash, they took the spiked shoulder shirt away, and his gown's bottom is more ripped. I myself would like to see this as a texture and compare the two. (There is just so much detail in that new splash.)

I thought that would be too much trouble for the TU team.
Here, just for you:
http://i58.tinypic.com/e8swt0.png Avoided his skirt/legs on purpose, I got lazy )x
I must say that your updated picture does look epic and better. Hope you feel like doing the legs as well. So far, your Udyr is looking epic.
Morg just needs a new model in general... She's so dated :/
genius.

They are trying to update the older models or skins so that they don't look so cartoonish with the new SR update.

The new SR has a dark, pastel, DOTA-like look to it & having some of these outdated bright models running around would make it an eyesore.

I do agree with the Morgana comparison though. She does need touched up so she doesn't look sick or zombified.
why is my sheriff caitlyn a blue haired woman now?
I think it's to keep them in line with the visual hierarchy of the new SR. Champs should stand out more than the background, but less than abilities.
WTF happened to Sheriff Caitlin? She has blue hair and it horribly clashes with the western theme she's supposed to be going for. At least make her hair brown or black (like it used to look)

Sometimes I really want to slap Riot artists when I read threads like this. Seriously they have a job because they are supposed to be good at what they do but their attention to details is horrendous.  
I bet they didn't even take a look at the splashes when updating textures. These are things that should be done by them already.
